title: Christmas Now Starts in July
itunes:title: Christmas Now Starts in July
description:
Marissa Tarleton, CEO at RetailMeNot, explains why July is now the beginning of the holiday shopping season.

Host: Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
